targets.rawSql:
SELECT a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO",
    	e.cedula::Text "CEDULA",
    	e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
    	e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO",
    	b.nombre::Text "ESTADO",
    	c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO",
    	d.nombre::Text "PARROQ",
    	a.direccion::Text "DIR",
    	a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
	  	f.name::Text "CATEGORIA",
	  	g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",
	  	k.nombre::Text "RESOLUTOR",
	  	case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
		i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
		to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY  hh:mm:ss')::Text "FECHA",
		to_char(a.fecha_registro,'dd-mm-YY hh:mm:ss') as "FECHA ESTATUS",
       case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
		k.nombre::Text "RESPONSABLE"
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            left JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
      where  j.id_resolutorio in (359,406)
      and j.principal is true
      and i.nombre in ($estatus)

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (359) 
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)

panels.title: CASOS EN EL SISTEMA GAS DIRECTO

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (359)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (359)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (4,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (359)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
AND ((a.feedback < 2 and a.verificado is null) or (a.feedback is null and a.verificado is null))

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (359)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
                                           FROM gestion.caso a
                                           inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                           where b.id_resolutorio in (359)
                                           and b.principal is true
                                           and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (359)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (406) 
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)

panels.title: CASOS EN EL SISTEMA GAS COMUNAL

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (406)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (406)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (4,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (406)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
AND ((a.feedback < 2 and a.verificado is null) or (a.feedback is null and a.verificado is null))

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (406)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
                                           FROM gestion.caso a
                                           inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                           where b.id_resolutorio in (406)
                                           and b.principal is true
                                           and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (406)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

select b.nombre::Text "ESTADOS",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "RECIBIDO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ASIGNADO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (4,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "EN PROCESO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND ((a.feedback < 2 and a.verificado is null) or (a.feedback is null and a.verificado is null)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "POR CONFIRMAR",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ATENDIDO", --, count(a.id) as "TOTAL"
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (4) and  e.id_resolutorio in (599) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2) AS "% EFECTIVIDAD %"
from gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio z on z.id =  e.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
where  a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (4) 
and b.id < 25 and  e.id_resolutorio in (406)
and e.principal is true --and z.nombre in ($gobernaciones)
group by b.nombre
HAVING count(*) > 1
order by "% EFECTIVIDAD %" desc

select b.nombre::Text "ESTADOS",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "RECIBIDO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ASIGNADO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (4,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "EN PROCESO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND ((a.feedback < 2 and a.verificado is null) or (a.feedback is null and a.verificado is null)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "POR CONFIRMAR",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ATENDIDO", --, count(a.id) as "TOTAL"
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (4) and  e.id_resolutorio in (503) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2) AS "% EFECTIVIDAD %"
from gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio z on z.id =  e.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
where  a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (4) 
and b.id < 25 and  e.id_resolutorio in (359)
and e.principal is true
group by b.nombre
HAVING count(*) > 1
order by "% EFECTIVIDAD %" desc

list.definition: SELECT nombre FROM gestion.estatus Where id in (3,4,6,8)
list.label: ESTATUS
